fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player and a number greater than the amount of living Mafia members. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target receives **exactly** the amount of votes you specified, they will be hanged instead of whoever was intended to be hanged.
- When your ability is active, the day will only end when the length of a day is reached, not at a majority vote.
- Effects from your abilities do not announce what caused them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Mafia.
